title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1050.12 - Persons authorized to issue notices of violation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1050.12 - Persons authorized to issue notices of violation

State Regulations

Any police officer or other person(s) designated by the
president of the authority shall be empowered to issue a notice of violation
for violation of any of these rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1050.12

Amended

New

York State Register October 14, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 40, eff. 10/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
